Tag_Imageneed.description: ''Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Amorges had disappeared into Messenia. Kassandra and Darius set about dismantling the Order to lure him out and find her Elpidios|child.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Bloodline'

General_Description: '''Two Knives Against the Dark''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra disrupted the Cult's business in [[Messenia]] by preforming several feats.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Bloodline]]''
